tasks.fedify-codegen: cat ../src/vocab/vocab.ts > /dev/null || (deno run --allow-read --allow-write --check ../src/codegen/main.ts ../src/vocab/ ../runtime/ > ../src/vocab/vocab.ts && deno fmt ../src/vocab/vocab.ts && deno cache ../src/vocab/vocab.ts && deno check ../src/vocab/vocab.ts)
tasks.codegen: deno task fedify-codegen && deno task generate-import-map && deno task sync-version
tasks.check: deno task codegen && deno fmt --check && deno lint && deno check **/*.ts
tasks.run: deno task codegen && deno run --allow-all mod.ts
tasks.publish: deno task codegen && deno task generate-import-map --release && deno publish
tasks.pack: deno task codegen && deno run -A scripts/pack.ts
